textBeforeTable: The table below looks at the demand and provides a guide to the average salaries quoted in IT jobs citing VMware Server within the UK over the 3 months to 31 July 2015. The 'Rank Change' column provides an indication of the change in demand within each location based on the same 3 month period last year. VMware Server Top 30 Job Locations This chart provides a salary histogram for IT jobs citing VMware Server over the 3 months to 31 July 2015 within the UK. VMware Server Salary Histogram This chart provides the 3-month moving average for salaries quoted in permanent IT jobs citing VMware Server within the UK. VMware Server Salary Trend This chart provides the 3-month moving total of permanent IT jobs citing VMware Server within the UK as a proportion of the total demand within the System Software category. VMware Server Jobs Demand Trend -1.31% +1.33%
textAfterTable: VMware Server Top 30 Related IT Skills For the 6 months to 31 July 2015, IT jobs within the UK citing VMware Server also mentioned the following IT skills in order of popularity. The figures indicate the number of jobs and their proportion against the total number of IT job ads sampled that cited VMware Server. 1 251 (100.00%) VMware 2 198 (78.88%) Windows 3 147 (58.57%) VMware Infrastructure 4 146 (58.17%) Active Directory 5 120 (47.81%) MS Exchange 6 114 (45.42%) Windows Server 2008 7 103 (41.04%) Microsoft 8 102 (40.64%) SAN 9 76 (30.28%) Exchange Server 2010 10 71 (28.29%) Citrix 11 68 (27.09%) Windows Server 2003 12 66 (26.29%) Cisco 13 61 (24.30%)
